item.title: Develop Online of Recommender System
item.description: In this part, you’ll change some code to add two features in online part, and then deploy them to your Recommender System. Add portrait recall Open file Change code, because we already prepared the code, you just need to uncomment this code. Push your change to your github repo Check CI/CD Test it. Add hot topic Open file Change code, because we already prepared the code, you just need to uncomment this code.
